name: Timothy Brits
bio: Software engineer from Pretoria specialising in .NET and Node.js. I love building projects and contributing to open source. When I'm not coding, you'll find me with audiobooks, my dog, or a chess board. Proudly neurodivergent. I stand with Ukraine.

links.title: GitHub
links.description: Open-source contributions and personal projects focusing on web development

links.description: Translate cron expressions to plain English instantly

links.title: Blokilo
links.description: TUI to test ad-blocking DNS and hosts file setups

links.title: Vortludo
links.description: A Wordle clone (Vortludo means word game in Esperanto)

links.title: SADAG
links.description: South African Depression and Anxiety Group - Mental Health resources and support - a cause I advocate for
